ProcedurePlanDefinitionVersion.name: ProcedurePlanDefinitionVersion
ProcedurePlanDefinitionVersion.description: Represents the versions for a procedure plan definition. Multiple versions under a procedure plan definition must be active at a time, which can be resolved at run time using the rank field.

ContextDefinition.description: The context definition associated with the procedure plan definition record.

DefaultReadContextMapping.description: The default read context mapping used to read from the mapped object and populate the context definition.

DefaultSaveContextMapping.description: The save context mapping used to save from the context definition and populate the mapped object.

DeveloperName.description: The unique name of the procedure plan definition version record.

EffectiveFrom.description: The date and time when the procedure plan definition comes into effect.

EffectiveTo.description: The date and time when the procedure plan definition is no longer in effect.

InheritedFrom.description: The template from which this procedure plan definition is created.

IsActive.description: Indicates if this procedure plan definition version is active (true) or not (false).

ProcedurePlanDefinitionId.description: The procedure plan definition associated with this procedure plan definition version record.

Rank.description: The current rank of the procedure plan definition version thatâ€™s used to determine which procedure plan definition version is executed .
